
{{alias}}( str, search, replacement )
    Replaces the substring after the last occurrence of a specified search
    string.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    search: string
        Search string.

    replacement: string
        Replacement string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Output string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var str = 'beep boop';
    > var out = {{alias}}( str, ' ', 'foo' )
    'beep foo'
    > out = {{alias}}( str, 'o', 'foo' )
    'beep boofoo'

    See Also
    --------
